tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Arthi has become our family dentist. Really she is so friendly, listens to all the complaints with patience, explains the cause and the solution for the problem in detail. The most important factor is her treatment is pain free as I feel. She makes it that way . Even wisdom tooth extraction was little complicated for me. She made it so simple. I did not feel any discomfort. 

Even my kids knew what their dental problem is and what is to be done. She explains very clearly so that they can also understand.. I strongly recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I did root canal treatment and crown implant for my wife. Dr. Aarthi Praveen is a very friendly doctor. My wife  was very comfortable with the doctor . She had 4 to 5 sittings with proper appointments and we didn‚Äôt wait for more than 20 minutes in each sittings. Dr. Aarthi Praveen clearly explains what is the issue and what are the options for the crown with the patient and gets their opinion before the treatment. Overall it was a comfortable experience for my wife.

tags: None
review: Dr Aarthi is my go to doctor for all my dental needs. She is great with patients, treats them with huge respect and makes comfortable. I got my root canal done, crown placement and couple other treatments and I have never felt any discomfort during any of my visits. I have already recommended her to a couple of my friends and family and will continue to refer her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: After consulting so many dentists & unhappy with the end result I finally ended up meeting Dr.Arthi at her clinic.  I have personally experienced the excellence of her service.Dr.Arthi was so caring and supportive. She did a detailed checkup and explained on the root cause & fixed it.  Today my problem is permenantly fixed as I am maintaining healthy oral hygiene on the advise of Dr.Arthi. I will highly recommend the doctor and her clinic. Their services are exceptional!!! .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Aarthi is very good person and when you visit her and talk to her 90% of pain goes just in few min. She ensure as patient will be comfortable first and then explain him about the problem, solution and kind of treatment required
During the treatment she take utmost care that no unnecessary pains to patient.

Very skill full in her treatment and procedure of treatment. Hospital is also very good neat and clean. Light instrumental music gives more mental comfort to patient while undergoing treatment.

Overall excellent Doc for all problems

Keep it up Dr. Aarthi
